Round 11 Instructions

In the past rounds the infrastructure efficiency declined from one round to the next at a constant amount of 25%. In the following rounds the average decline of the infrastructure efficiency will remain the same, but the actual amount of decline can vary from round to round. This means that in some rounds the decline will be larger than 25% and some rounds the decline will be smaller than 25%. Before each round begins you will continue to make a decision on how much to invest in the irrigation infrastructure. After all of your investment contributions have been submitted the resulting level of infrastructure efficiency will be displayed and then the round will begin. If you have any questions, please ask them now.
